skills.name: Web Standards
skills.pattern: Remix uses Web Fetch API, FormData, Request, Response

skills.name: Progressive Enhancement
skills.pattern: Forms work without JavaScript, JS enhances experience

skills.name: Flat Routes
skills.pattern: routes/_index.tsx, routes/about.tsx, routes/users.$id.tsx

skills.name: Nested Routes
skills.pattern: routes/dashboard.tsx (parent) + routes/dashboard._index.tsx + routes/dashboard.settings.tsx

skills.name: Outlet
skills.pattern: import { Outlet } from '@remix-run/react'; <><Nav /><Outlet /></>

skills.name: loader
skills.pattern: export const loader = async ({ request, params }) => { return json({ user: await getUser(params.id) }) }

skills.name: useLoaderData
skills.pattern: const { user } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>()

skills.name: Throw Responses
skills.pattern: if (!user) throw json({ error: 'Not found' }, { status: 404 })

skills.name: action
skills.pattern: export const action = async ({ request }) => { const form = await request.formData(); return redirect('/success') }

skills.name: Form Component
skills.pattern: <Form method='post'><input name='email' /><button type='submit'>Submit</button></Form>

skills.name: useActionData
skills.pattern: const data = useActionData<typeof action>(); {data?.errors?.email}

skills.name: useNavigation
skills.pattern: const nav = useNavigation(); const isSubmitting = nav.state === 'submitting'

skills.name: useFetcher
skills.pattern: const fetcher = useFetcher(); <fetcher.Form method='post' action='/api/like'>

skills.name: fetcher.submit
skills.pattern: fetcher.submit({ intent: 'delete' }, { method: 'post', action: '/items' })

skills.name: fetcher.load
skills.pattern: useEffect(() => { fetcher.load('/api/suggestions') }, [])

skills.name: meta Function
skills.pattern: export const meta: MetaFunction = () => [{ title: 'Page' }, { name: 'description', content: '...' }]

skills.name: Dynamic Meta
skills.pattern: export const meta: MetaFunction<typeof loader> = ({ data }) => [{ title: data.post.title }]

skills.name: ErrorBoundary
skills.pattern:
export function ErrorBoundary() { const error = useRouteError(); return isRouteErrorResponse(error) ?

{error.status}

:

skills.name: Session Storage
skills.pattern: const { getSession, commitSession } = createCookieSessionStorage({ cookie: { name: '__session', secrets: ['s3cr3t'] } })

skills.name: Use Session
skills.pattern: const session = await getSession(request.headers.get('Cookie')); session.set('userId', id)

skills.name: defer
skills.pattern: return defer({ critical: await getData(), lazy: getSlowData() })

skills.name: Await
skills.pattern: <Suspense fallback={<Skeleton />}><Await resolve={data.lazy}>{(d) => <List data={d} />}</Await></Suspense>

skills.name: Link
skills.pattern: <Link to='/about' prefetch='intent'>About</Link>

skills.name: NavLink
skills.pattern: <NavLink to='/about' className={({ isActive }) => isActive ? 'active' : ''}>

skills.name: useNavigate
skills.pattern: const navigate = useNavigate(); navigate('/dashboard', { replace: true })

skills.name: shouldRevalidate
skills.pattern: export function shouldRevalidate({ formAction }) { return formAction !== '/logout' }

skills.name: Resource Routes
skills.pattern: // routes/api.users.ts (no default export)\nexport const loader = () => json(users)

skills.name: headers Function
skills.pattern: export const headers: HeadersFunction = () => ({ 'Cache-Control': 'max-age=3600' })

skills.name: handle Export
skills.pattern: export const handle = { breadcrumb: 'Dashboard' }; const matches = useMatches()
